extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.util.List<Critter> babies  
      private static boolean determining_encounters
      This boolean flag represents whether or not worldTimeStep() is in the encounter phase Since the Critters can only move during the movement phase and encounter phase, this being false implies the movement phase, so we need not check the critter versions
      private static boolean doingWorldTimeStep  
      private int energy  
      private static long global_version  
      private static java.lang.String myPackage  
      private static java.util.List<Critter> population  
      private static java.util.Random rand  
      private long version
      version is essentially a fix to avoid having to iterate through boolean hasMoved flags Is set to global_version when the Critter has moved, so if version != global_version, a Critter may move.
      private int x_coord  
      private int y_coord

      • y_coord

        private int y_coord

      • version

        private long version
        version is essentially a fix to avoid having to iterate through boolean hasMoved flags Is set to global_version when the Critter has moved, so if version != global_version, a Critter may move.

      • global_version

        private static long global_version

      • determining_encounters

        private static boolean determining_encounters
        This boolean flag represents whether or not worldTimeStep() is in the encounter phase Since the Critters can only move during the movement phase and encounter phase, this being false implies the movement phase, so we need not check the critter versions

        private static boolean doingWorldTimeStep

      • getEnergy

        protected int getEnergy()

      • walk

        protected final void walk​(int direction)
        Attempt to take 1 step in a given direction. Checks if caller has moved this turn already. Deducts Params.walk_energy_cost regardless If a Critter is calling to attempt to flee combat, checks to see if movement will be blocked by another Critter.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction to walk

      • run

        protected final void run​(int direction)
        Attempt to take 2 steps in a given direction. Checks if caller has moved this turn already. Deducts Params.run_energy_cost regardless. If a Critter is calling to attempt to flee combat, checks to see if movement will be blocked by another Critter.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction to run

      • newX

        private final int newX​(int current_x,
                       int direction,
                       int steps)
        Determine what x coordinate will be after a specified move
        Parameters:
        current_x - The current x coordinate
        direction - The direction to move (0-7)
        steps - How many steps to take in said direction
        Returns:
        The resulting x coordinate after the move.

      • newY

        private final int newY​(int current_y,
                       int direction,
                       int steps)
        Determine what y coordinate will be after a specified move
        Parameters:
        current_y - The current y coordinate
        direction - The direction to move (0-7)
        steps - How many steps to take in said direction
        Returns:
        The resulting y coordinate after the move.

      • look

        private final Critter look​(int direction,
                           int num_steps)
        Look at a potential walk/run coordinate and find the first alive critter that is there that isn't the caller.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction to look (0-7)
        num_steps - How many steps in said direction to go to look
        Returns:
        The first Critter found to inhabit the space. Null if none.

      • check_encounter

        private final Critter check_encounter()
        Iterate through the list of critters and return the first other one that shares the same space and is alive
        Returns:
        The first non-calling alive critter at caller's location. Null if none exists

      • reproduce

        protected final void reproduce​(Critter offspring,
                               int direction)
        The method a Critter will call when it wishes to reproduce. Checks minimum energy, and adds the offspring to the babies list at the appropriate location. Initializes inherited baby fields.
        Parameters:
        offspring - The baby to add
        direction - Where relative to the parent to put the baby

      • doTimeStep

        public abstract void doTimeStep()

      • fight

        public abstract boolean fight​(java.lang.String oponent)

      • makeCritter

        public static void makeCritter​(java.lang.String critter_class_name)
                        throws InvalidCritterException
        create and initialize a Critter subclass. critter_class_name must be the unqualified name of a concrete subclass of Critter, if not, an InvalidCritterException must be thrown. (Java weirdness: Exception throwing does not work properly if the parameter has lower-case instead of upper. For example, if craig is supplied instead of Craig, an error is thrown instead of an Exception.)
        Parameters:
        critter_class_name -
        Throws:
        InvalidCritterException

      • getInstances

        public static java.util.List<Critter> getInstances​(java.lang.String critter_class_name)
                                            throws InvalidCritterException
        Gets a list of critters of a specific type.
        Parameters:
        critter_class_name - What kind of Critter is to be listed. Unqualified class name.
        Returns:
        List of Critters.
        Throws:
        InvalidCritterException

      • runStats

        public static void runStats​(java.util.List<Critter> critters)
        Prints out how many Critters of each type there are on the board.
        Parameters:
        critters - List of Critters.

      • clearWorld

        public static void clearWorld()
        Clear the world of all critters, dead and alive

      • worldTimeStep

        public static void worldTimeStep()
        Advance the Critter World by one time step, first by calling doTimeStep() for every critter, then by running through encounters. These are then followed by application of resting costs, a culling of the dead, and then the addition of babies and Algae to the main population.

      • displayWorld

        public static void displayWorld()
        Print to the console the current state of the Critter world, with all critters being represented by their toString()
